CustomField.description: Para uso do HDE, informa a data final de tratativa ou quantos dias j√° fora excedidos
CustomField.formula: IF(FinalSLA__c == '1 DU', MID(TEXT(DueDate__c), 9, 2)&"/"&MID(TEXT(DueDate__c), 6, 2)&"/"&MID(TEXT(DueDate__c), 0, 4)&" "&TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(DueDate__c), 12, 2))-3)&MID(TEXT(DueDate__c), 14, 3), IF(FinalSLA__c == '10 DC', IF(CreatedDate + 1 > NOW(), MID(TEXT(CreatedDate + 10), 9, 2)&"/"&MID(TEXT(CreatedDate + 10), 6, 2)&"/"&MID(TEXT(CreatedDate + 10), 0, 4)&" "&TEXT(VALUE(MID(TEXT(CreatedDate + 10), 12, 2))-3)& MID(TEXT(CreatedDate + 10), 14, 3), TEXT( ROUND( NOW() - (CreatedDate + 1), 0)) + ' dia(s) atrasado(s)'),''))
CustomField.label: Data Final de Tratativa
